graph.drawing

Class Drawing<V extends Vertex,E extends Edge<V>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.drawing.Drawing<V,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    V -
    E - 

    public class Drawing<V extends Vertex,E extends Edge<V>>
extends java.lang.Object
    A drawing Γ of a graph G = (V, E) is a mapping of each vertex v in V to a distinct point Γ(v) and of each edge e = (u, v) in E to a simple open Jordan curve Γ(e), represented here with a list of its nodes' positions, which has Γ(u) and Γ(v) as its endpoints.
    Author:
    xxx
